Experimental work was performed at the Diamond Light Source, employing the Surface Village’s off-line UHV chamber for sample preparation and beam line I07 for SXRD measurements.
18 In situ preparation of rutile TiO 2(011) involved repeated cycles of Ar + bombardment and annealing in vacuum to ∼1150 K. A clean, well-ordered single-phase (2 × 1) termination was achieved, in agreement with previous studies.
11, 13, 19 This was determined using low energy electron diffraction, X-ray photoelectron spectroscopy, and STM.
